parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Shudder and Loss of Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission shudder can cause loss of power, making it difficult to accelerate, especially when turning or merging, which can lead to accidents.
Unintended acceleration and brake engagement can cause accidents, especially when merging or turning, and can lead to loss of control of the vehicle.
Transmission control system failure can cause loss of power, difficulty shifting gears, and unintended acceleration or braking, which can lead to accidents.
Clutch and transmission failure can cause loss of power, difficulty shifting gears, and unintended acceleration or braking, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: clutch pedal feels soft or spongy

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defective transmission fluid can cause transmission shudder, loss of power, and difficulty shifting gears, which can lead to accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress into Trunk and Electrical Compartment
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water accumulation in the trunk and electrical compartment can cause electrical shorts, fires, and complete failure of the vehicle's electrical system, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: and fires; vehicle shutting down or stalling; doors unlocking or locking unexpectedly; windows malfunctioning; interior lights staying on; smoke or burning odors coming from the trunk.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Electrical system failures, including hacking, can cause loss of vehicle control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: Vehicle not starting; instrument panel and On-Star service failures; doors failing to open; various electrical failures occurring remotely; hacking incidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Door and window malfunctions can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if they occur while driving.
symptoms: Doors unlocking or locking unexpectedly; windows malfunctioning; knocking noises from doors; interior lights staying on; control panel flashing notifications.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Battery drain and stalling can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if they occur while driving.
symptoms: Battery draining quickly; vehicle stalling; difficulties starting the vehicle; clutch wear and tear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become stiff or hard to turn, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes stiff or hard to turn
the vehicle drifts to one side
the power steering warning light illuminates
the steering wheel becomes difficult to control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The tramlining or unstable steering issue can cause the vehicle to drift to one side, making it difficult to control, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle drifts to one side
the driver must overcompensate while steering
the vehicle fails to drive in a straight line.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Window Separation in Convertible Top
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the rear window from the convertible top can cause the glass to shatter or fly out while driving, potentially striking another vehicle or causing injury.
symptoms: Bubbles or separation of the rear window from the convertible top
glass window is partially detached (~25% in some cases).

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty warning message can cause the vehicle to roll away, potentially leading to accidents or injuries, especially on inclined surfaces.
symptoms: "Shift to Park" warning message appears despite the vehicle being in park

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission shudder can cause loss of control, accidents, or stalling, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: Transmission shudders or vibrates while driving
even after servicing the transmission fluid.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loss of Power on Takeoff (Manual Transmission)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of power on takeoff can cause accidents, especially when merging onto a busy road or intersection.
symptoms: Loss of power or hesitation when taking off from a standstill with a manual transmission.
